CustomField.formula: AND ( OR( UPPER(Eloqua_Business_Unit__c) = "RESPIRATORY", UPPER(Eloqua_Business_Unit__c) = "UROLOGY", UPPER(Eloqua_Business_Unit__c) = "ANESTHESIA", UPPER(Eloqua_Business_Unit__c) = "EMS", UPPER(Eloqua_Business_Unit__c) = "ALTERNATE CARE", UPPER(Eloqua_Business_Unit__c) = "SURGICAL DISPOSABLES", UPPER(Eloqua_Business_Unit__c) = "SURGICAL INSTRUMENTS" ), OR(MailingCountry="US", MailingCountry ="USA", MailingCountry = "United States of America", MailingCountry = "United States", MailingCountry="us" ) )
CustomField.label: Eloqua Sync
